website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a kit that can produce a large amount of home-brewed kombucha, this set will do the trick.
pros: Makes up to 128 bottles at a time
Comes with an attractive brew vessel that includes tap
A good gift for someone who really loves kombucha
cons: You may want to upgrade the plastic bottles that come with this kit

customer_reviews.title: Poor design and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Poor design and a waste of money. They have you use two rubber bands to hold the cover cloth in place. However, the neck of the jar is designed such that the first rubber band slips off and falls into the kombucha. Thus, I have had several ruined batches and am going back to using my old jar.
customer_reviews.author: cizja

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: As someone who drinks a lot of Kombucha buying this kit allows me to save money and brew my own at home. Easy to follow directions has allowed me to start my first batch as soon as it arrived. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with having made this purchase and the results are ...
customer_reviews.text: We researched various starter kits and selected this "continuous brew" product from Get Kombucha. Everything came as expected - well packaged and ready to set-up. Instructional videos were helpful and give a friendly orientation to set-up and process. We had a few questions in the first week or so, the "Customer Support" staff were very very helpful: quick to reply and gave us relevant, knowledgable responses to our questions. Very happy with having made this purchase and the results are superb.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t come with great instructions:( confusing:(
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was an instructuon book. I had so many questions I had to get online and figure it out. Just a thought but if u sell a starter kit, send a booklet!! Not an index card!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Hey! I have been using the continuous kombucha system for several weeks now, and even though my house is on the cool side, my tea is delicious and full of zingy goodness! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Milnes

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely excellent
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fabulous and exactly what they did it would. The flavor is out of this world delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to do and can't wait to taste it in ...
customer_reviews.text: We started our first batch today. Was easy to do and can't wait to taste it in 3-5 days.
customer_reviews.author: TaH

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at how easy making kimbucha was with this kit! I was intimidated at first but after 4 batches I feel like an old pro!
customer_reviews.author: candice

customer_reviews.title: A great starter kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: A great starter kit for beginners . Follow the directions and you will make great kombucha. 3 of my children and 3 friends now have this kit and they all love it. I like the tea blend provided and have reordered several times. A definite must is to get the glass beer bottles to use for your secondary fermentation. Seem to work a lot better than screw bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just started my 2nd batch and love this system. Customer service is 1st class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone that wants to make their own Kombucha . You will love using it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit
customer_reviews.text: Looking great, can’t wait to taste it. Instructions are super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Uwe Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Idiot proof. Excellent kit.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing kit. It's definitely idiot proof. Everything is so easy to do and to get going. Package is wonderful and quick. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Weldner

customer_reviews.title: Best kit out there!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best kit out there high quality and comes with every thing you need! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! One month in and I have perfected my continuous brew! Very easy to use and set-up and lots of support if you need it. I even had a personal email from the Founder Dave, along with an individual video from him regarding a question that I had. Do not hesitate - you will not regret this!
customer_reviews.author: PlanetFerg

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Arrived right on time. The product was as good or better than I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Wright

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: We found the directions to be unhelpful, inconsistent, and overall bad. We do not think this product is worth the price. You are way better off buying these things separately.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J. Duisterhof

customer_reviews.title: Not much for $200!
customer_reviews.text: Totally not satisfied with this kit! The little brown plastic medicine bottles are a joke! There is only a small amount of sugar and tea. The Jug was OK but there is maybe $50 of stuff in the box for over $200! I returned it and I bought bulk tea, sugar, large glass fermenting jars, and a dozen bigger grolsh style bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Estrem

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a disappointment for a $200 product. I watched several tutorials on making Kombucha; I cleaned everything with white vinegar; I followed all the instructions IMPLICITLY; so excited for my first batch! It's day 9 and the original scoby is still at the bottom and only a small amount of slime is present. Maybe the scoby was bad?
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: We love it so much, this is our 2nd continuous brew kit!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this (our second continuous brew kit) because we love it and Kombucha so much! It's beautiful and everything in the kit is so well thought out. All that's needed is 5 minutes and a Philips screwdriver and it's ready to brew! It makes a great gift, too! While opening the box (just arrived), I turned on the camera so to share what's inside this kit and show how easy it is to put together. Enjoy! You'll love it, too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Wardee

customer_reviews.title: ... never made kombucha before and this kit made it easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I had never made kombucha before and this kit made it easy to set up. Everything you need is provided, plus a quick setup guide that will get you going in no time. I would recommend watching the instructional videos (provided) first though but you only need to see it once. The process is very simple and easy to do, and you'll have kombucha at a fraction of the cost of store-bought!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: If that's what you want...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine. After I received the pack I realized I could have saved some serious money from buying things individually, but, that's life! If you are lazy, get the pack, pay more. If you are motivated, buy individually (and skip the tiny plastic bottles) and save money.
customer_reviews.author: Rory's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Kombucha kit.  Wife recommends for everyone wanting to get started!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this kit as a gift for my wife. Worked well first time out and grows new Scobies every batch. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Degan

customer_reviews.title: Kombucha Tea Brewing Made Easy!
customer_reviews.text: I Received my kit and made my first batch of kombucha tea and it turned out fabulous! I love this continuous brewing method with this crock and I love the large 2 1/2 gallon size. This is the easiest way to make your own brew!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything it promised to be and more
customer_reviews.text: We just watched the video and started a batch of kombucha yesterday and are very excited to see the results. I found the kit so well put together with a great deal of thought put into its contents. Thank you what a marvelous value.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: L have been brewing batch, and love the tea. Just got the continuous brew kit.and got it started was really easy with the kit to start it. Hope it works well so I can have a continuous supply.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Stanley Swift

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic! I went from being an absolute beginner to ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic! I went from being an absolute beginner to a pro in no time. The amber bottles the kit comes with are useless though. I have not used them once.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Kleinbaum

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Kombucha kit!
customer_reviews.text: Great starter kit! Everything you need if you've never home brewed kombucha before. Highly recommended!!! And the customer support is top-notch!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: great complete set-up
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my wife, perfect, complete set-up. we are both enjoying the tea.
customer_reviews.author: dsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased as a gift. From all accounts it has been a hit!
customer_reviews.author: TarMak

customer_reviews.title: Best Starter Kit out there
customer_reviews.text: After I found the information (on YouTube) I feel this is the best kit. Shipping was speedy and the kit well packed. For a first time experience at making Kombucha I would recommend this company. After a little difficulty connecting I realized email is the best for questions. I got a speedy response and am very pleased with the quality. I'm expecting my first batch to be ready soon & am happy with the progress. I did a lot of research and do feel very confident with the quality of the SCOBY. This kit is a great way to get started. A big thank you to Dave, who runs a great company.
customer_reviews.author: Ilovecats

customer_reviews.title: It is a great set except the storage bottles are a cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: It is a great set except the storage bottles are a cheap plastic. When I washed them they melted on the top rack of my dishwasher. I am guessing they were not a safe plastic and so I am glad I didn't get a chance to use them. The rest of the set is working well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Beeler

customer_reviews.title: All the equipment and accessories seem to be good quality and complete EXCEPT for the stand
customer_reviews.text: I'm just starting my first batch, so can't comment yet on successful brewing. All the equipment and accessories seem to be good quality and complete EXCEPT for the stand, which, in a word, is LAME. It will take some serious jerry rigging to make it level/sturdy/useful. I think I'll probably order a $35 dollar metal stand from Berkey (goes under their water filters) to do the job well. Again, stand was the problem that downgraded this review to three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kim R.

customer_reviews.title: Love me some Kombucha
customer_reviews.text: Yeah. No complaints at all. This is a great kit. I had a chance to interact with Dave and, like everyone else, was super impressed. Great product, great customer service. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service, products, and support!
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is unparalleled! Product is Delicious! Accessories are high quality! Tons of support available via getkombucha.com! I recommend to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BREWMASTER SELECT Kombucha Continuous Brew Kit System - Drink Kombucha Tea On Tap (Making A Lifetime Of Home Brewed Kombucha Tea Easy For You) GetKombucha
product_meta.description:
Size:3. Brewmaster Select- Make Your Very Own Kombucha Tea At Home With A PREMIUM Kombucha Continuous Brew Kit System by Get Kombucha 
- Certified GMO Free, Fair Trade and Organic Ingredients 
- Includes 2.5 Gallon Porcelain Brewing Vessel w/ Handcrafted Wood Brewer Stand - 
-Two Non Dehydrated HUGE Organic Kombucha SCOBY Cultures w/ Free Live Starter Mother Liquid 
-Organic Whole Leaf Tea Blend and Sugar (enough for 8 Gallons!) 
-Bottles For Flavoring - Ph Strips - All Natural Ingredient Boosters for Flavor, Energy, Digestion, Weight Loss, Health and Happiness 
-Heater Pad used for both your brewer and bottling 
-Digital PH tester 
-All 4 Kombucha Tinctures (extract, pro, tonic, toner) 
-Recipe guides, videos, LIFETIME CUSTOMER SUPPORT 
- This kit includes the Largest Organic Kombucha Scoby in North America and already comes packaged with organic living starter tea liquid. PLUS 120 servings of Kombucha Tea Blend, 2 pounds of Evaporated Sugar Cane Juice, Brewing Accessories (covers, bands, ph testers, tea filter bags, etc) 
- This Continuous Brewing Kit Starter Kit Includes everything you need to make 8 GALLONS of Kombucha Tea (that’s 128 bottles!).. the brewing equipment, is completely reusable for a lifetime! 
- Culture grown by 10+ year Kombucha veteran in a clean, insured work space. 
- Access to over 117 Kombucha FAQ online training videos included with your order 
- The All Natural Large Scoby Mother is grown exclusively with GetKombucha’s proprietary in house formulated Organic Custom Kombucha Whole Leaf Tea Blend. 


 
Rejuvenates Your Health And Will Save You Up To $447 Each and Every Month


Backed By Our Money Back Guarantee!! 


We Know You Will Love It or Your Money Back! Click The Yellow Add To Cart Button At The Top Of This Page To Begin Making Great Tasting Kombucha Tea Today!
feature_bullets: DRINK KOMBUCHA ON TAP - {Our Most High End Kit} Includes 2.5 Gallon Porcelain Brewing Vessel w/ Wood Brewer Stand, 2 HUGE Organic SCOBY Cultures w/ Free Starter Mother Liquid, Organic Whole Leaf Tea Blend, Sugar, Bottles For Flavoring, Digital Ph Tester, Heater Mat, All 4 Tinctures (extract, probiotic, tonic & facial toner), Boosters for Flavor, Energy, Digestion, Weight Loss, Health & Happiness, Recipe Guides - Guaranteed To Make Twice As Much Booch In Half The Time!

THE RESULTS - Makes enough kombucha for 1-4 people each and every week. That’s up to 28 16 oz bottles. Never buy another kombucha at the store. Making your own kombucha allows you to control the sugar, caffeine, and alcohol levels of your kombucha.. plus personalize to your specific taste and flavor. This kit has everything you need to get started on your first 8 Gallons Of Kombucha Tea.

THE QUALITY- The meticulous level of care and attention that goes into the creation of this brewing kit is 9+ years of development. Triple Certified Lead Free Brewing Vessels, Certified Organic whole leaf tea blend (developed in house), to date the ONLY tea blend to receive organic certification for the use of home kombucha brewing. Even the bottles that you receive in this kit have been continuously improved to provide more pressure to build the fizz for your home brewed kombucha tea.

COMPANY - Get Kombucha'S philosophy is simple; Teach a man and woman to fish they will eat for a lifetime, teach them how to make the most incredible kombucha tea, using the highest quality ingredients, they will drink for a lifetime… and have more money and happiness because of it. Each and every product comes with a Lifetime of Customer Support… plus instant access to over 100+ support, recipe, faq, videos.

THE GUARANTEE - Thousands of home brewers are already raving about Get Kombucha Continuous Brew Kits and we know you will love it too;If you don’t find yourself making the most delicious kombucha at home, at a fraction of the price, we don’t want you to have it, so we will buy the kit back from you. You have nothing to loose and only unlimited kombucha on tap to gain.
